subject: Re: Riddle me this?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Interesting. I'll have to remember your story next time I get negative about this stuff. 

 Maybe I shouldn't ask, but ya get anything for 2012? I get all the doomsville junk from the boxes, but I'm not convinced. 

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Jean Brisson <sonny_mtl_can@...> wrote:
>
> I alway had the EVP thing happen to me on a nomal radio. I tried to explain that 
> I had EVPs on the radio since the early 70's. Back then people would think EVP 
> was evil and many would attack me even though I was under age. I also explained 
> EVP to many people because I had a vision of how too do Ghostbox by flipping the 
> radio dial. I also explained: Songs can be used like Tarot cards! Anything can 
> speak to a person like the wind for example..
> 
> Besides having visions I also used to sing songs on the radio years before they 
> came out. The news recorded me many times singing songs and warning of things 
> before they happened. That's how I got to do movie/rock star readings and warned 
> of things like 9/11 to politicians and put things in the media like "The plane! 
> The plane!" on Fantacy Island. http://youtu.be/_xG7Qwv23sg that would warn of 
> the 9/11 terror attacks or actually warning of the conspiricy with-in and that 
> someone was doing something.
> The 9/11 emergency phone number is also a warning of  9/11 terror attacks and 
> the feeling someone was going to do something.
> What I am saying is I was there (in the 70's)with the politicians in Canada 
> warning of 9/11 to Americain politicians saying we would make the emergency 
> phone number the same accross north America and what the number meant. 
> 
> We also spoke of the TV shows that warned of 9/11. Fantacy Island, SCTV and many 
> other tv shows or songs that would have a 9/11 feeling. SCTV is a great example 
> of this where all of Canada was saying "Take-off eh. Like you know eh, you 
> hosers you know." It even became a hit song. http://youtu.be/1BFPt001PYU Rush 
> sang with the SCTV comediens Bob and Doug and it became a large part of a 
> Canadian's identity, "Like you know,eh?"(a psychic expression like we all know)
> I did this type of thing for many TV shows, movies, songs and politicians of 
> many countries. I put my image in some of it and it shows too.
> The whole time people have been trying to dismiss me, get me to loose me 
> jobs,loose  girlfriend and  friends. And People tried to kill me. My 
> ex-girlfriend said my baby it not mine and everyone believes her, so I lost my 
> kid!
> Now I am a psychic for adviser network.
> Sonny Psychic
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ________________________________

> hear what I hear. 
> 
>

> F-S
